com.risk.model

Class FortificationPhaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.FortificationPhaseModel

  • public class FortificationPhaseModel
extends java.util.Observable
    The Class FortificationPhaseModel is an Observable class which has methods for processing fortifications and also this class is being observed by an Observer FortificationUI to display the internal dyanmic details during the reinforcement phase.
    Author:
    Navjot Kaur Bhamrah
    See Also:
    FortificationUI

    • Field Detail

      • fortifySet

        public static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> fortifySet
        This TreeSet stores the territories in String values in form "fromTerr-toTerr" where fromTerr is the source territory from which fortifications can be sent and toTerr is the destination territory which can recieve forces from fromTerr. Basically it stores paths available for fortifications.

        Only applicable for Aggressive, Benevolent, Human and Random Player

      • fortifySetCheater

        public static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> fortifySetCheater
        This TreeSet stores the territories of cheater player where the territory has adjacent territories belonging to other players.

      • fortifySetEmpty

        public static int fortifySetEmpty
        This method allows the player to move the armies after attack phase has been completed.

        The armies will only be moved if the there is adjacency between two countries and also If each territory has armies equal to or more than one.

      • territoryMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> territoryMap
        The territory map.
